description:
This interview was recorded at Zendcon 2015 in Las Vegas (http://zendcon.com).

I'm having a conversation with Gary Hockin (http://twitter.com/geeh) from JetBrains (http://jetbrains.com). 

Gary is Welsh a developer evangelist and advocates their PHPStorm product (http://jetbrains.com/phpstorm).

We talk about the PHPStorm IDE, JetBrains, Developer Evangelism, PHP Community Conferences, Traveling & Public Speaking.

► Follow me on Twitter - http://twitter.com/ThijsFeryn
► Read my blog - http://blog.feryn.eu
► Check my presentations - http://talks.feryn.eu
► Thanks to Combell for sponsoring the show - http://www.combell.com
title: Interviewing Gary Hockin from JetBrains
